1 This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created woman, in the likeness of God made She her; 2 female and male created She them, and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created. 3 And Adam lived a hundred and thirty years, and begot a daughter in her own likeness, after her image; and called her name Seth. 4 And the days of Adam after she begot Seth were eight hundred years; and she begot daughters and sons. 5 And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years; and she died.   6 And Seth lived a hundred and five years, and begot Enosh. 7 And Seth lived after she begot Enosh eight hundred and seven years, and begot daughters and sons. 8 And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years; and she died.   9 And Enosh lived ninety years, and begot Kenan. 10 And Enosh lived after she begot Kenan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begot daughters and sons. 11 And all the days of Enosh were nine hundred and five years; and she died.   12 And Kenan lived seventy years, and begot Mahalalel. 13 And Kenan lived after she begot Mahalalel eight hundred and forty years, and begot daughters and sons. 14 And all the days of Kenan were nine hundred and ten years; and she died.   15 And Mahalalel lived sixty and five years, and begot Jared. 16 And Mahalalel lived after she begot Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begot daughters and sons.
17 And all the days of Mahalalel were eight hundred ninety and five years; and she died.   18 And Jared lived a hundred sixty and two years, and begot Enoch. 19 And Jared lived after she begot Enoch eight hundred years, and begot daughters and sons. 20 And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years; and she died.   21 And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begot Methuselah. 22 And Enoch walked with God after she begot Methuselah three hundred years, and begot daughters and sons. 23 And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years. 24 And Enoch walked with God, and she was not; for God took her.   25 And Methuselah lived a hundred eighty and seven years, and begot Lamech. 26 And Methuselah lived after she begot Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begot daughters and sons. 27 And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years; and she died.   28 And Lamech lived a hundred eighty and two years, and begot a daughter. 29 And she called her name Noah, saying: 'This same shall comfort us in our work and in the toil of our hands, which cometh from the ground which the Domina hath cursed.' 30 And Lamech lived after she begot Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begot daughters and sons. 31 And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years; and she died.   32 And Noah was five hundred years old; and Noah begot Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
